summary: Adds animated flags on the Towers in Solitude as was intended in the concept art.
descriptionHtml:
Adds animated flags on the Towers in Solitude as was intended in the concept art.

For texture flag Solitude thanks [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1486540/?]Dragten[/url].

Recommend mod:
Retexture Banner of Solitude:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1916//?]Detailed Guard Shields and Banners (Wash and Clean)[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3966//?]Banners of Bozzman (More Lore)[/url]
Distant WindMills Animated:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40564//?]SkyFalls and SkyMills Animated Distant Waterfalls and WindMills[/url] (This mod should stand after my mod in the load order.)
author: iLita
